name: Tooth Fairy
description:
the concept of the tooth fairy is pretty messed up, isn't it?

(p.s. turn your sound on!)

(p.p.s. there are two possible endings – can you see both?)

---

this game was made for the 'Tooth' bitsy jam, which happened to coincide with magazine deadline, i am very tired now

featuring the musical stylings of Lukas Kunce (@LukasKunce on Twitter), he nailed it!! check out more of Lukas' music here: https://soundcloud.com/acro_bat

shoutouts also to @mildmojo,  Sean S. LeBlanc, and David Mowatt for the bitsy hacks!
